<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>Fix script to create bot properties and db image files</description> <name>Slack-Create Associate Files</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[createAssociativeFiles();
function createAssociativeFiles() { gs.info('Running Fix script for creating slack bot records'); var slackBotConfig = new SlackBotConfig(); slackBotConfig.createRecords(); }]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>akhil.parashara@snc</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-18 02:50:37</sys_created_on> <sys_id>cf0da7231bb60110382c43b8b04bcb3d</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Slack-Create Associate Files</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Conversational Custom Chat Integration" source="com.glide.cs.custom.adapter">4e8d78203c75311068bcf327dfe37fd0</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_cf0da7231bb60110382c43b8b04bcb3d</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-05-03 18:41:10</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>true</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
